Histogram calculation methods (methods.py)¶

methods.colorspaceHistogram(img, space='RGB', useCoALBP=False)¶

A method proposed by Boulkenafet et al. which uses three LBP passes, one over each channel of the given color space

Parameters

  • img (numpy.ndarray) – The image to be processed

  • space (str, optional) – The color space to be used. Options are ‘HSV’, ‘YCrCb’ and ‘Dual’ (concatenation of ‘HSV’ and ‘YCrCb’). If a different value is given the RGB color space will be used

  • useCoALBP (bool, optional) – If true the CoALBP descriptor is used otherwise \(LBP_{8, 1}\)

Returns

The concatination of the three calculated histograms

Return type

list(int)

methods.grayscaleLBP(img, useCoALBP=False)¶

The simples algorithm collecting a single LBP pass on a grayscale image into a histogram

Parameters

  • img (numpy.ndarray) – The image to be processed

  • useCoALBP (bool, optional) – If true the CoALBP descriptor is used otherwise \(LBP_{8, 1}\)

Returns

The calculated histogram

Return type

list(int)

methods.grayscaleMultiCoALBP(img)¶

This method combines three sizes of the CoALBP operator: (1, 2), (2, 4) and (4, 8) into a concateaed histogram

Parameters

img (numpy.ndarray) – The image to be processed

Returns

The calculated histogram

Return type

list(int)

methods.maattaHistogram(img)¶

A method proposed by Maatta et al. which uses eleven passes concatenated to a single histogram. The passes are: An \(LBP_{16, 2}\) and an \(LBP_{8, 2}\) over the entire image and nine \(LBP_{8, 2}\) passed over overlapping squares

Parameters

img (numpy.ndarray) – The image to be processed

Returns

The concatination of the eleven calculated histograms

Return type

list(int)
